encias\\\",\\\"tie_dye\\\",\\\"triple_black\\\",\\\"trust_your_run\\\",\\\"uniforia_pack\\\",\\\"unisex\\\",\\\"unitefit\\\",\\\"verano\\\",\\\"viajeros\\\",\\\"watch_us_move\\\",\\\"whitespark_pack\\\",\\\"workout\\\"],\\\"technology\\\":[\\\"aeroready\\\",\\\"boost\\\",\\\"bounce\\\",\\\"climalite\\\",\\\"primeknit\\\",\\\"heat.rdy\\\",\\\"lightstrike\\\",\\\"techfit\\\",\\\"lightmotion\\\",\\\"formotion\\\",\\\"stay_in_play\\\",\\\"traxion\\\",\\\"torsion\\\",\\\"wind.rdy\\\",\\\"continental\\\",\\\"4d\\\",\\\"climacool\\\",\\\"cold.rdy\\\",\\\"aeroknit\\\",\\\"ortholite\\\",\\\"response_foam\\\",\\\"flow_shield\\\",\\\"gore_tex\\\",\\\"goretex\\\",\\\"period_proof\\\",\\\"puremotion\\\",\\\"rain.rdy\\\",\\\"recycled_materials_prime\\\",\\\"aeroready_warming\\\",\\\"climastorm\\\",\\\"cold.rdy_waterrepellent\\\",\\\"adifit\\\",\\\"climaproof\\\",\\\"climawarm\\\",\\\"made_w_parley_ocean_plastic\\\"],\\\"sportsubsub_es_co\\\":[\\\"argentina\\\",\\\"arsenal\\\",\\\"atletico_junior\\\",\\\"belgica\\\",\\\"boca_juniors\\\",\\\"chile\\\",\\\"colo_colo\\\",\\\"colombia\\\",\\\"espana\\\",\\\"fc_bayern_munchen\\\",\\\"independiente_medellin\\\",\\\"juventus\\\",\\\"manchester_united\\\",\\\"mexico\\\",\\\"millonarios\\\",\\\"peru\\\",\\\"real_madrid\\\",\\\"river_plate\\\",\\\"tigres_uanl\\\",\\\"universidad_de_chile\\\"],\\\"partner_es_co\\\":[\\\"2_chainz\\\",\\\"aktiv\\\",\\\"antonieta_gaxiola\\\",\\\"beyonce\\\",\\\"clubes\\\",\\\"daniela_gaxiola\\\",\\\"disney\\\",\\\"el_rey_leon\\\",\\\"farm\\\",\\\"federaciones\\\",\\\"impermeable\\\",\\\"ivy_park\\\",\\\"jeremy_scott\\\",\\\"jordan_moss\\\",\\\"karlie_kloss\\\",\\\"kevin_lyons\\\",\\\"krusty_burger\\\",\\\"lego\\\",\\\"los_simpson\\\",\\\"marimekko\\\",\\\"materiales_reciclados\\\",\\\"monsters_inc\\\",\\\"nini_sum\\\",\\\"norma_palafox\\\",\\\"pharrell\\\",\\\"poliester_reciclado\\\",\\\"resistente_al_agua\\\",\\\"rich_mnisi\\\",\\\"sock\\\",\\\"trae_young\\\",\\\"uefa_champions_league\\\",\\\"zoe_saldana\\\"],
